mapper.sql: id, bank_repay_imp_record_id, isvisit, circumstances, police, notarization, second_mortgage, collection_manId, islaw, dispatched_staff, dispatched_date
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id , bank_repay_imp_record_id, isvisit, circumstances, police, notarization, second_mortgage, b.`name` AS collection_manId, islaw, dispatched_staff, dispatched_date FROM collection_new_info a left join employee b on a.collection_manId = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and bank_repay_imp_record_id = #{bankRepayImpRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into collection_new_info (id, bank_repay_imp_record_id, isvisit, circumstances, police, notarization, second_mortgage, collection_manId, islaw, dispatched_staff, dispatched_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankRepayImpRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isvisit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circumstances,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{police,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notarization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondMortgage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectionManid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{islaw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispatchedStaff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispatchedDate,jdbcType=DATE})
